home.title: We protect you from scammers
home.subtitle: Search, report and warn others about fraud
home.searchPlaceholder: Enter name, phone, email or IBAN...

filtersPanel.title: Search & Filters
filtersPanel.modeAutoDesc: Automatically selects the best mode for your query

placeholders.title: Brief and descriptive title (e.g., 'Bitcoin Investment Scam')
placeholders.description: Describe what happened, how you were contacted, amounts involved, etc...

consent.terms: I agree to the Terms of Service

success.title: Report submitted successfully!
success.description: Thank you for your contribution to protecting others.

financialDetails.title: Financial Details
financialDetails.subtitle: Enter details about financial accounts where you sent money
infoItems: Fill in at least one section (banking, crypto, or PayPal)
This information will help identify scammers
All sensitive information is encrypted and masked

banking.title: Banking Information
banking.description: IBAN, account number, SWIFT/BIC code and other banking details

financialDetails.ibanHint: IBAN starts with country code (e.g., GB, DE, FR) and contains 15-34 characters
financialDetails.otherBankingDetailsPlaceholder: Additional notes or banking information that may be useful...

crypto.title: Cryptocurrency Details
crypto.description: Wallet addresses, blockchain, exchanges and transactions

financialDetails.blockchainHint: Select the blockchain where the wallet is located
financialDetails.exchangeNamePlaceholder: For example: Binance, Coinbase, Trust Wallet, MetaMask
financialDetails.exchangeNameHint: If an exchange or known wallet was used
financialDetails.transactionHashHint: Unique transaction identifier in blockchain (if available)
financialDetails.paypalAccountHint: Email address or PayPal account username
financialDetails.tipTitle: Tip: How to get this information?
tipItems: Check transaction history in your bank or wallet
For crypto transactions use block explorer (e.g., etherscan.io)
Look at emails with payment confirmations
Every detail can help identify the scammer

contact.title: Contact Information & Consents
contact.subtitle: Your details are optional but will help us contact you if needed
contact.yourNameHint: Your name will not be published and will only be used for internal communication
contact.wantUpdatesDesc: We will inform you about the status of your report and similar scams
contact.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service
contact.agreeToTermsDesc: I confirm that the information in this report is true and that I have read the
contact.agreeToGDPRDesc: I agree to the processing of my personal data in accordance with the
infoItems: Your report will be reviewed by an administrator
After approval it will be published with masked data
It will help warn others about similar scams
If you provide email, you will receive confirmation

review.title: Review Report
review.subtitle: Check all details before submitting. Click "Edit" to change information.
review.noCompanyVehicleData: No company or vehicle information provided
warningItems: You have not included sensitive data of third parties without their consent
You have the right to share attached evidence

digitalFootprints.title: Digital Footprints
digitalFootprints.subtitle: Enter online profiles and technical information about the perpetrator
digitalFootprints.facebookHint: Enter profile name or full URL

website.title: Website & Domain
website.description: Information about websites used in the fraud

digitalFootprints.domainNameHint: Just the domain name without http://
digitalFootprints.domainCreationDateHint: When was the domain registered (if known)

ip.title: IP Address Information
ip.description: Technical details about the origin of the fraud

digitalFootprints.ipCountryHint: Which country did the IP address originate from
digitalFootprints.ispProviderPlaceholder: For example: Comcast, Verizon, Deutsche Telekom...
digitalFootprints.infoText: This information helps create a digital profile of the perpetrator and allows law enforcement to track and identify scammers across multiple platforms. All sensitive data is protected and masked according to your access level.

perpetrator.title: Perpetrator Information
perpetrator.subtitle: Enter all available information about the person or company that committed the fraud

types.individualDesc: A person who committed the fraud

perpetrator.physicalDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the perpetrator's appearance - height, build, hair/eye color, distinctive features...
perpetrator.physicalDescriptionHint: If you saw the perpetrator in person or on video, describe their appearance
perpetrator.socialMediaHint: Enter profile links separated by comma (format: Platform: handle)
perpetrator.tip: The more information you provide, the better we can warn others. All sensitive data is protected and masked according to your access level.

companyVehicle.title: Company & Vehicle Information
companyVehicle.subtitle: Enter details about the company and vehicle related to the fraud
companyVehicle.vatTaxIdHint: Organization identification number or tax identification number
companyVehicle.vinError: VIN must contain exactly 17 characters (letters A-Z except I, O, Q and numbers 0-9)
companyVehicle.registeredOwnerHint: Enter the owner's name as shown on vehicle registration

importantInfo.title: Important Information:
items: Company and vehicle details are optional but can significantly help identify the scammer
All sensitive data is protected and only shown to authorized persons
If you have documents (invoices, contracts), add them in the Evidence section

evidence.title: Evidence & Attachments
evidence.subtitle: Upload screenshots, documents, or videos that prove the fraud

descriptions.paymentDesc: Bank statements, transfer receipts, payment confirmations
descriptions.fraudsterPhotosDesc: Photos or images of the scammer
descriptions.damageDocumentationDesc: Documents proving financial or other damage
descriptions.crimeSceneDesc: Photos of locations related to the fraud

tips: Screenshots of conversations with the scammer
Emails and messages from the scammer

comments.title: Comments
comments.approval: Comment will be published after approval

errorPage.title: Something went wrong
errorPage.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

notFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
notFoundPage.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

hero.title: Support Our Mission ‚Äì
hero.titleHighlight: Help Us Bring Justice and Safety to Everyone
hero.description: Our vision is that justice and safety should not be reserved only for those who can afford them financially. We want our services to be available free of charge to everyone ‚Äì because every person deserves protection, a chance for a new beginning, and fair treatment.
hero.subdescription: To remain independent and sustainable, some of our services must be paid. However, we do everything possible to ensure that the majority of our activities remain completely free for victims of fraud and for those seeking a second chance.

howToHelp.title: Your contribution allows us to continue work that makes a
howToHelp.description: You can support us with a one-time or recurring donation ‚Äì by credit card or cryptocurrency ‚Äì and choose which of our two programs you would like to support:

program1.title: Public Protection and Fighting Fraudsters
features: Development and improvement of our free fraud detection system
Marketing and awareness campaigns to reach as many people as possible
Legal services that help us create a safe and effective environment
program1.impact: Your support in this fund means fewer victims of fraud and stronger public protection.

program2.title: A Second Chance for People Who Want to Leave Crime Behind
features: Retraining courses and educational programs for people released from prison
Financial support to help them find jobs and reintegrate into society
Assistance with basic needs when starting a new life
program2.impact: Your support here changes lives ‚Äì giving a chance to those who want to leave criminal environments and live honestly.

cta.title: Support us today and become part of the change.
cta.description: Your contribution ‚Äì no matter how big or small ‚Äì means more than you can imagine. Together we can build a world where justice is accessible to everyone.
cta.learnMore: to learn more about our work.

hero.title: Request for Database Deletion
hero.subtitle: Help for a New Beginning in Life
hero.description: We believe in privacy and second chances. Our platform offers individuals with criminal pasts an opportunity to request deletion from our scammer database and receive support for life reintegration.

quote.text: Everyone deserves a second chance. It's not where you started that matters, but where you're going.
quote.author: ScamNemesis

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please review these requirements carefully before submitting your request

basicRequirements.title: Basic Requirements
items: Your case/scammer ID from our database
Commitment statement for future lawful behavior

importantNotices.title: Important Notices
items: One opportunity per person ‚Äî use it wisely
Any future criminal activity permanently closes this door
All requests are evaluated individually based on case severity

howToRequest.title: How to Request Deletion
howToRequest.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to submit your database removal request

steps.title: Wait for Review
steps.description: Our team will evaluate your case (14-30 days)

steps.title: Receive Decision
steps.description: Get notified about the outcome of your request

pdfGuide.title: PDF Guide: The Path Out of Criminality
pdfGuide.subtitle: Practical guidance for those seeking to leave criminal environments
features: Step-by-step guide for leaving criminal environments safely
Resources for mental health and addiction recovery
Employment strategies for individuals with criminal records
Legal rights and reintegration information by country

breakCycle.title: Break the Cycle
breakCycle.content: If you are currently part of a criminal organization and want to leave, know that there is always a way out. Your first step is to seek help ‚Äî whether from law enforcement, support organizations, or trusted individuals. The path to a new life begins with a single decision.
breakCycle.reminder: Remember: It's never too late to change your path.

vision.title: Our Vision of Help
vision.subtitle: We are developing comprehensive programs to assist individuals seeking to leave their criminal past behind. Here are three initiatives we plan to implement:

initiatives.title: Financial Support
initiatives.description: Assistance for released individuals during the transition period

initiatives.title: Family Assistance
initiatives.description: Support services for families of those seeking a fresh start

initiatives.title: Education & Retraining
initiatives.description: Opportunities for skill development and career change

donation.title: Support the Second Chance Program
donation.description: Your contribution helps us provide resources, guidance, and support to individuals seeking to leave criminal lifestyles behind and build a better future.

contact.title: Ready to Start Your New Journey?
contact.descriptionEnd: to begin your removal request process. We're here to help you every step of the way.

finalMessage.quote: The past is your lesson. The present is your gift. The future is your motivation.

hero.title: World-class, expert-led cybersecurity training from the world's
hero.description: Prevent fraud and attacks‚Äîsecure your environment and strengthen cyber resilience with Scamnemesis.
hero.comingSoonText: Our training courses are currently in development. Contact us at
hero.comingSoonTextEnd: to be notified when they launch.

programs.title: Cybersecurity Courses
programs.description: We offer training and educational content tailored for different audiences ‚Äî from the general public seeking basic protection to specialized professionals and organizations requiring advanced instruction.

freeCourses.title: Free Courses for the Public
freeCourses.description: Short, practical lessons to protect yourself and your loved ones online:
items: How to recognize a scam ‚Äî key red flags and warning signals
What to do if you've been scammed ‚Äî a quick, effective response guide
How to set up your phone and computer securely
How to behave safely online ‚Äî practical habits and guidelines
How to protect your children online

professionalVideos.title: Professional Videos
professionalVideos.description: OPSEC and cybersecurity for professionals ‚Äî training for specialists who need to recognize, prevent, and respond to threats:

audiences.title: AML Specialists
audiences.description: In-depth modules on transaction monitoring, red flags, and investigative techniques.

audiences.title: Police Officers
audiences.description: Focused on investigation methodology, evidence collection, and cyber-enabled crime response.

audiences.title: Accountants
audiences.description: Fraud indicators in financial records, internal controls, and whistleblower best practices.

audiences.title: IT and Security Personnel
audiences.description: Network defense, phishing simulations, secure infrastructure configuration.

audiences.title: Investigators
audiences.description: OSINT techniques, digital forensics fundamentals, and case documentation.

companyTraining.title: Company Training and Security Methodology
companyTraining.description1: We train staff and help implement a complete security methodology ‚Äî so every team member knows what to do and who to contact in case of a threat.
companyTraining.description2: Our corporate programs include policy implementation, role clarification, incident response procedures, and ongoing support.

items.title: Live threat intelligence
items.description: We work daily on active crypto and investment fraud cases, so our content always reflects the latest tactics used by criminals.

items.title: Continuously updated curriculum
items.description: As new scam methods emerge, our courses evolve, ensuring you're never behind.

items.title: Practical, not just theoretical
items.description: We teach actual protection strategies, not just abstract concepts.

items.title: From victims to experts
items.description: Our perspective includes deep insight into both victim psychology and scammer behavior, giving you a 360¬∞ understanding.

certifications.title: Certifications and Credentials
certifications.description: Our instructors and content creators hold recognized certifications in cybersecurity, fraud investigation, and compliance ‚Äî bringing credibility and expertise to every lesson.

cta.title: Book a Free Consultation
cta.description: Whether you're an individual looking to learn, a professional seeking certification-track training, or an organization interested in a tailored security program, we're here to help.
